item.title: Sunday Latte - 26 April 2020
item.description: Here are few good articles from last week readings Career advice for people with bad luck Politics emerge when the players believe the game is zero sum. Try not to learn the wrong habits. Failure I call living Give a full read, worth it How to overcome mental laziness If you have already reached reading till this, you don't need them :) Few gems from the conversation:
